casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Wade CARTER. No. 269P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of May 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
